newsitem.title: POLAND: Poland offers PLN 700 mln fixed 2-yr, 5-yr bonds.
newsitem.headline: Poland offers PLN 700 mln fixed 2-yr, 5-yr bonds.

text.p: Poland's treasury will offer 700 million zlotys of fixed two-year and five-year bonds at tender on November 21, 1996, the central bank said.

It said the value date for shorter 16-percent, two-year paper, due February 12, 1999, is December 5, 1996, while the value date for the longer 12-percent, five-year bond, due February 12, 2002, is December 12, 1996.
